Text: awesome set Mothra67. those text pieces by kirby in 2 & 3 are interesting reads, too.
Thanks! Loved DD when I was a kid!

you're both very welcome!

and yes, they are interesting.  He did alot of those while waiting for letters to come in.  It turns out that Marvel made him do this series in answer to DC's Kamandi which he also did, but when his books at marvel did not do well, he then went on to animation and storyoarding, got the benefits he wanted for his family, and was much happier!!!!
ok, my share ratio on this hit over 31, so it's time for all you downloaders to keep it seeding for others to enjoy!
